appearances.title: U.S., Canada & Mexico Political Leaders on Global Sportsmanship : CSPAN3 : January 7, 2026 1:20am-2:13am EST
appearances.snippet: but please welcome senator bill hagerty. [applause] sen. hagerty: thanks. thank you. good afternoon, everybody. it is a great honor to be here with all of you today. i think about the history of this, what transpired back in 1988 when president reagan led the vote to bring the world cup to america for the first time. in 1994, the world cup arrived and we set attendance records that have yet to be beat. we still maintain the highest attendance record for a world cup in history with that event. i look forward to seeing if we can't break that in 2026. i thought i might share with you why this is so personal to me. i could not be more excited to have this happen here in america. it is just a tremendous privilege to see this manifest itself. my interest in soccer goes back a long way. but some of you may not know this. i actually let the organizing committee to bring a major-league soccer team to my home state capital in nashville, tennessee. back in may of 2016, i remember going to visit the mls headquarters. and at that point in time, it was a competition for the next fo
